Package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration

Provides concrete configuration implementations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractConfiguration Abstract implementation of a configuration that supports a parent configuration.
KeyPrefixConfiguration Configuration that delegates to another configuration by prefixing all keys with a well-defined prefix value.
KeyUtilities Utility methods around key listing.
MultiplexingConfiguration Configuration that multiplexes a master and a slave configuration.
PropertiesConfiguration Configuration that is backed by a Properties object.
SystemPropertyConfiguration Configuration that looks up its value in the system properties.
 

Package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration Description

Provides concrete configuration implementations.

Convenience package that contains reusable Configuration implementations that might come in handy when implementing a Simple Taglet.
